Test Case Description: Verify that the invoice header contains correct details such as invoice number, billing period, invoice date, due date, account number, and total amount due.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and viewing the invoice page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Invoice page.
2. Review the invoice header for correct display of invoice number, billing period, invoice date, due date, account number, and total amount due.
Expected Result: Invoice header displays correct information including invoice number, billing period, invoice date, due date, account number, and total amount due.

Test Case Description: Verify that the charges breakdown displays all relevant charges, including plan charges, usage charges, and other fees.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and viewing the invoice page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Invoice page.
2. Review the charges breakdown section for plan charges, usage charges, and other fees.
Expected Result: Charges breakdown displays accurate information for plan charges, usage charges, and other fees.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Data Overages and Roaming Charges
Test Case Description: Verify that data overages and roaming charges are displayed accurately under the usage charges section.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and viewing the invoice page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Invoice page.
2. Check the usage charges section for data overages and roaming charges.
Expected Result: Data overages and roaming charges are displayed correctly in the usage charges section.

Test Case Description: Verify that any applicable discounts or promotions are displayed and deducted from the total amount.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and viewing the invoice page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Invoice page.
2. Review the discounts and promotions section for any applicable deductions.
Expected Result: Applicable discounts and promotions are displayed and deducted from the total amount.

Test Case Description: Verify that the total amount is calculated correctly by summing all charges and deducting any discounts.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and viewing the invoice page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Invoice page.
2. Verify that the total amount is calculated correctly based on the charges and discounts.
Expected Result: Total amount is calculated correctly by summing all charges and applying any discounts.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Download Invoice button is functional and allows the user to download the invoice in PDF format.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and viewing the invoice page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Invoice page.
2. Click on the Download Invoice button and verify that the invoice is downloaded as a PDF.
Expected Result: Download Invoice button works and allows the user to download the invoice in PDF format.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Print Invoice option allows the user to print the invoice.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and viewing the invoice page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Invoice page.
2. Use the Print Invoice option to print the invoice.
Expected Result: Print Invoice option works and the invoice is printed successfully.

Test Case Description: Verify that the payment history, if displayed, accurately reflects previous payments applied to the account.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and viewing the invoice page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Invoice page.
2. Review the payment history section (if displayed) for accuracy of previous payments.
Expected Result: Payment history section accurately reflects previous payments applied to the account.
